00036 /* Public Functions ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00041 /*********************************************************************/
00080 void CLKPWR_SetPCLKDiv (uint32_t ClkType, uint32_t DivVal)
00081 {
00082         uint32_t bitpos;
00083 
00084         bitpos = (ClkType < 32) ? (ClkType) : (ClkType - 32);
00085 
00086         /* PCLKSEL0 selected */
00087         if (ClkType < 32)
00088         {
00089                 /* Clear two bit at bit position */
00090                 LPC_SC->PCLKSEL0 &= (~(CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_BITMASK(bitpos)));
00091 
00092                 /* Set two selected bit */
00093                 LPC_SC->PCLKSEL0 |= (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_SET(bitpos, DivVal));
00094         }
00095         /* PCLKSEL1 selected */
00096         else
00097         {
00098                 /* Clear two bit at bit position */
00099                 LPC_SC->PCLKSEL1 &= ~(CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_BITMASK(bitpos));
00100 
00101                 /* Set two selected bit */
00102                 LPC_SC->PCLKSEL1 |= (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_SET(bitpos, DivVal));
00103         }
00104 }
00105 
00106 
00107 /*********************************************************************/
00141 uint32_t CLKPWR_GetPCLKSEL (uint32_t ClkType)
00142 {
00143         uint32_t bitpos, retval;
00144 
00145         if (ClkType < 32)
00146         {
00147                 bitpos = ClkType;
00148                 retval = LPC_SC->PCLKSEL0;
00149         }
00150         else
00151         {
00152                 bitpos = ClkType - 32;
00153                 retval = LPC_SC->PCLKSEL1;
00154         }
00155 
00156         retval = CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_GET(bitpos, retval);
00157         return retval;
00158 }
00159 
00160 
00161 
00162 /*********************************************************************/
00196 uint32_t CLKPWR_GetPCLK (uint32_t ClkType)
00197 {
00198         uint32_t retval, div;
00199 
00200         retval = SystemCoreClock;
00201         div = CLKPWR_GetPCLKSEL(ClkType);
00202 
00203         switch (div)
00204         {
00205         case 0:
00206                 div = 4;
00207                 break;
00208 
00209         case 1:
00210                 div = 1;
00211                 break;
00212 
00213         case 2:
00214                 div = 2;
00215                 break;
00216 
00217         case 3:
00218                 div = 8;
00219                 break;
00220         }
00221         retval /= div;
00222 
00223         return retval;
00224 }

00228 /*********************************************************************/
00266 void CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (uint32_t PPType, FunctionalState NewState)
00267 {
00268         if (NewState == ENABLE)
00269         {
00270                 LPC_SC->PCONP |= PPType & CLKPWR_PCONP_BITMASK;
00271         }
00272         else if (NewState == DISABLE)
00273         {
00274                 LPC_SC->PCONP &= (~PPType) & CLKPWR_PCONP_BITMASK;
00275         }
00276 }
00277

00279 /*********************************************************************/
00284 void CLKPWR_Sleep(void)
00285 {
00286         LPC_SC->PCON = 0x00;
00287         /* Sleep Mode*/
00288         __WFI();
00289 }
00290 
00291 
00292 /*********************************************************************/
00297 void CLKPWR_DeepSleep(void)
00298 {
00299     /* Deep-Sleep Mode, set SLEEPDEEP bit */
00300         SCB->SCR = 0x4;
00301         LPC_SC->PCON = 0x8;
00302         /* Deep Sleep Mode*/
00303         __WFI();
00304 }
00305 
00306 
00307 /*********************************************************************/
00312 void CLKPWR_PowerDown(void)
00313 {
00314     /* Deep-Sleep Mode, set SLEEPDEEP bit */
00315         SCB->SCR = 0x4;
00316         LPC_SC->PCON = 0x09;
00317         /* Power Down Mode*/
00318         __WFI();
00319 }
00320 
00321 
00322 /*********************************************************************/
00327 void CLKPWR_DeepPowerDown(void)
00328 {
00329     /* Deep-Sleep Mode, set SLEEPDEEP bit */
00330         SCB->SCR = 0x4;
00331         LPC_SC->PCON = 0x03;
00332         /* Deep Power Down Mode*/
00333         __WFI();
00334 }
